p: A toxicity assay carried out showed that O. basilicum EO topical application resulted in higher mortality over methyl chavicol and linalool to adult stages. Adults exposed to EO (LD 50 10.01 μg/adult) were more susceptible than those exposed to methyl chavicol and linalool (LD 50 13.62 μg/adult and LD 50 43.12 μg/adult, respectively). Imidacloprid was more toxic (1.41 μg/adult) than EO and its constituents (Table 4).
